website_summaries.verdict: A good buy and a solid frame, though there is a chance you could get a faulty model.
pros: Stands out for the sleek, contemporary look of its metal headboard and foot board
An attractive frame at a mid-range price
cons: Some owners report quality control issues
Some frames may come with pieces that don't align properly

customer_reviews.title: Strong bed frame
customer_reviews.text: This is my first metal bed frame. I bought it for my parent’s visit. Something cheap and temporary. But when I received and installed it, wow I have to say it is really impressive. It is very strong. Even though it took me a while to assemble it but with the instruction it is very easy. Only the package is a little broken, I guess because it is very heavy. But nothing got damaged. Very happy with the price with the frame.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Very useful once it's put together
customer_reviews.text: This frame is OK good sturdy only when you're assembling it make sure no one gets on your way because you have to pay very close attention a lot of small parts different sizes different screws if you miss 1 step you have to undo it and start again. But it's value form the money it's worth it
customer_reviews.author: ROSIE

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for the price. It does take a while if you have a stubborn male doing it who don't like directions or to read the email that was sent from the company. 5 hours later I had a bed I could have done in one -2 hours myself. Its comfortable and the height is great. Queen can fit two adults one 8-year old and a German shepherd just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service and pretty good frame
customer_reviews.text: So I put a review that the parts didnt line up and I got an email from them trying to help fix the issue I appreciate that good customer service the frame works great so far I would buy if your short of money and want a pretty good bed frame
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Good frame for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bed frame. Very sturdy. Quiet too. A little hard to assemble, a few insert this side arrows would have been great. No box spring necessary. I had one so the bed is a little high but the underbed storage was necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed frame for the price! Very sturdy and sleek design!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great frame
customer_reviews.text: bought for our daughter. sturdy and looks nice. she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are difficult, but it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The directions were not very clear, but you can figure it out. We had a wooden slat bed prior to purchasing this bed frame. We have seen a marked improvement in our sleep quality!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, sturdy bed frame! I wouldn't say its squeak free but it is solid! There are many slats which help keep the mattress level without a box spring. It's a nice frame! Putting it together was slightly challenging, but worth the effort!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice no squeak frame!
customer_reviews.text: I suck at "Ikea" assembly but I got it done in about an hour! Very sturdy n makes NO NOISE!!! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Very thin weak metal (queen sized)
customer_reviews.text: I guess steel has a wide variety of grades, because this is quite soft and easily bent. I understood this was a cheap frame so my expectations were not terribly high, but I doubt it will last a year. I'm guessing all the good reviews are from the company or from people who do not plan to move on this bed at all. If you plan to get on the bed gently and not move much after getting in then it might last a little while, but I can't imagine a couple being able to use this bed. I guess we'll see. I'll update if the legs bend on mine the way they did on the other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and weak metal
customer_reviews.text: This bed is rated at 660 lbs and my whole family put together is less than that (wife, myself and 2 kids), the bed frame broke and snapped within 4 months of ownership. The support rods were the first to go then quickly everything else came tumbling down after. The fact that this company can not even back their product for a year should have been a dead giveaway not to buy/touch this frame. Save yourself the frustration, time, and money.
customer_reviews.author: Darren M.

customer_reviews.title: Queen Metal Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame several months ago. It was difficult to build. We like to change the layout of our rooms around often and this frame is not sturdy and is not holding up well. Several of the legs are bending in a slant potion and the headboard piece doesn't connect well so it is wobbly. We don't drag the bed frame when moving it, the legs slanting are from pushing it up to the wall once we positioned it. The Frame does look nice and would probably be great if it was to be placed in one spot and never moved.
customer_reviews.author: LexiPede

customer_reviews.title: Complicate
customer_reviews.text: The people that said they didn't have any trouble putting this together are wizards... Because this was a PROJECT..... Not a good one... But as advertised it is quiet. I can't tell how sturdy it is, but I was pretty surprised by how short it was. My bed would be at a normal height if I added a box spring, but then my mattress would be WAY above the footboard and it would look ridiculous. I would have returned this if it wasn't such a pain to put together. So I just got some bed risers and I'm making the best out of it for now.
customer_reviews.author: Noel B

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad ! Pretty good bed
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were a nightmare! However after 2 hours of figuring it out . It looks pretty good for the price ! I read some really bad reviews so I was worried it wouldn’t last . Granted it’s in a guest room so we don’t use it often however we tested it out , Married couple ( hehe) no squeaks ! Very sturdy too. I don’t regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Klaudya

customer_reviews.title: Instruction for assembly suck and low quality parts
customer_reviews.text: The design looks very complex and in the end works well for what seems to be a stable bed, but the instructions are hard to follow due to the quality of what was provided. There are definite nuances of part direction for hole alignment and those are not presented in the instructions causing rework. Some of the parts just break, there are plastic pieces that cap the end of metal and it is a very thin plastic, as you put the pieces together, the plastic snaps and becomes irrelevant making me wonder if it will cause problems in the future with the integrity of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Legs were unaligned within a month of purchase and now will not sit in place, we have tried taking apart and putting back together. Very frustrated with this product. 5 month update, legs keep unscrewing out of bolts and sitting diagonally. Legs have scuffed the floor... weve taken it apart at this point and have moved the mattress to the floor. Company hasnt bothered to reach out even after 1st review.
customer_reviews.author: Wahhhh

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: This bed was a pain in the rear to build and not because building it was hard, but because the instructions were dreadful. My husband has flat out stated that when we move he's not taking this bed apart and reassembling it - he'd rather leave it behind LOL. However, once the bed was assembled and made up, it was worth it. It was purchased for the spare room, but decided to sleep on it a few nights and woke feeling rested. In the end it was worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Grum

customer_reviews.title: Manual instuctions very understandable
customer_reviews.text: This is the most complicated and hard to understand j manual that they provided! Luckily, I had to take a break and try to figure it out how and what went wrong when I [ut it together. The plastic protectors were all pieces of garbage and I have to order the floor hardwood protectors to prevent my floors from scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything necessary. Didn’t need any extra tools. The instructions are small and a bit difficult but it’s doable. I’m a female that doesn’t like to put things together and did it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Connor

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This bed was purchased because of the advertised claims of supporting so many pounds. Pros: Simple aesthetic that matches most decor Cons: Constantly becomes loose and feels like it will fall apart. Slats bent on my husband's side, and he is only 220 pounds. Squeaks. Support legs held by bolts that bend, rendering the bed useless. In three months this frame broke due to inadequate leg support (held by cheap bolts). I do not reccomend this frame - it is not a long term purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Good luck putting it together. Nothing is labeled well and you have to go to youtube for a very hard to follow assembly video
customer_reviews.author: R-Tava

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame for my brother. He’s 350 lbs and sleeps in this bed alone. The bed started falling apart right after we put it up. The middle legs broke completely off and we support it with wooden boxes. We have hard wood doors and this bed literally slides all over the place when he gets in and out. I have since replaced the frame and will take pictures and attach when I have the time. I don’t recommend this bed for 350 or heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Wonderful Bed that makes NO NOISE
customer_reviews.text: This bed is fantastic. I was a little nervous when we bought it online without seeing it but it is great. It is comfortable and no matter how much you move, it doesn't make noise.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Houck

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for I suppose.
customer_reviews.text: This bed was a waste of my money. Maybe I just got a dud, that would explain all the good reviews, but I’ve had this bed for barely over four months and it is essentially disintegrating below us while we sleep. All of the support legs underneath the frame have almost entirely snapped off, leaving the primary legs to sway unsettlingly any time we put any weight on the bed. I’ll be dismantling it ASAP and spending more money on a frame elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: ArthurDent

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely upset! Just received this bed on our doorstep..... the package was a disaster! Hopeful that the bed inside would be undamaged, I unpacked it to assemble! Many of the pieces were out of the enclosed wrappings, and looked as if they were once taken out of the box and repackaged.... still hopeful I discovered that one of the very first pieces needed for assembly is missing..... along with ALL hardware for assembly! To say I’m am upset is an understatement! Hoping to salvage some of the packaging to box it up and send it back! Guess my son will he sleeping on his new mattress on the floor a bit longer!
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Great value if you can figure out how to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very sturdy and no squeaks, but man was it a pain in the ass to put together! I wish there were WRITTEN instructions instead of just picture to help put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: The Queen size was not a Queen !
customer_reviews.text: so disappointed and very dissatisfied. When putting together the many bars that got horizontally across the bed for the mattress to be laid on, it was missing two bars. Also the support beam that goes straight down the middle of the bed was not long enough...there was also a bent piece..the most upsetting part was that after finally building the “Queen bed frame”, I placed my queen mattress onto it AND THE FRAME WAS TOO BIG!!!! Almost about a foot of space....
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: The frame is very sturdy and squeak free so far.
customer_reviews.text: It took me about an hour and 45 minutes to assemble. Most of the parts didn't have letters on them. I read the instructions sheet that came in the box with the frame but, it didn't help much. It would have been better if the instructions sheet were more informative and all of the parts were lettered. Overall I am enjoying my new frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: please read
customer_reviews.text: worst decision buying this frame.it had support beams missing,the mid center support deosent fit as in the manual .the cross members dont sit snug theyre sort of flimsy.i would have gave it more credit if it had all pieces in it.
customer_reviews.author: tony carbone

customer_reviews.title: Issues with Setup - remedied
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this after reading reviews. However, while putting the frame together, one of the plastic pieces broke. Now one of the bars is pretty wiggly and I'm worried it will make sound while I'm in bed. Additionally, some of the screws were missing. I have requested that the manufacturer send me the missing pieces and a replacement for the plastic piece that broke. Fingers crossed that I can bump this review up and the manufacturer makes good on their promise! Update: The manufacturer has sent me a new frame rather than just the pieces I was missing. I’m not sure what I’m going to do with two frames now, but it was a nice gesture.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great deal..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.. will update any news as I go along. So for now I'm starting with 4 stars. I got it with no troubles. All the pieces were there. Instructions were easy enough to follow but small print. Putting it together I was alone doing it and you could definitely use a second set of hands when trying to do a couple of steps, but improvisation of a couple of boxes and a chair worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is intense!!
customer_reviews.text: First off the bed looks great once it’s assembled. It only took 2 women, 1 law enforcement officer, a 9 year old boy, and a needy cat to assemble it. The instructions are terrible even if you have excellent eyesight. They are nothing more than an exploded diagram that is illustrated in size 3 font. The parts and pieces are also not labeled except for on the outside of the plastic. All in all I would’ve spent a little bit more money to not have the headache assembling this bed. On a high note it is nice that with each step of the process it is started off by asking, “Please assemble blah blah blah..”.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my sons college bed. Went together relatively easily and seems sturdy enough. Good value for the money we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Directions could be larger in print and more than one sheet
customer_reviews.text: Assemble the head and footboard first with less pieces left it will be easier to understand the directions
customer_reviews.author: Dr review

customer_reviews.title: great bed
customer_reviews.text: one leg bent in the cent but still is great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this bed. It’s made of sturdy materials and at an affordable price. My box came damaged and is missing screws and pieces for assembly. Until this is corrected my 1 star stands. Edit: After contacting them to state my issue the seller has responded in a timely fashion and has solved my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dtavius

customer_reviews.title: A LOT of pieces
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have expected this, but this came with a lot of parts and took me awhile to put together. It works well enough though. The "headboard" side isn't that much higher than the footboard and I've had some issues with things falling through it a lot. Like I said, it does a good job for for the price. And it's not too flashy if you just want something that works.
customer_reviews.author: C.Marie

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming.
customer_reviews.text: Directions are completely backwards with poor translations. Box arrived extremely damaged and with parts missing. UPS driver was kind enough to search truck and find bags of screws and bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: My son is 140lbs and the bed broke after 6 months. Bars to support the mattress in the middle bent and a few even broke in two. Wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy for teens & adults & A LOT OF PIECES
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 1/2 hours to put together,was complicated & it was 2 people assembling it. I wouldn't recommend for an adult nor teenager because it won't last long not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This was awful to install. The instructions are not clear at all. I had to return it because after a couple hours on the install it wouldn’t stay put together. The support bars kept falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Lemmy&B

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy, Get What You Pat For
customer_reviews.text: Starting to come/fall apart after 3 months of general use. Not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the worst bed frame I have ever purchased. The directions are very brief and the pictures are super small. Parts of the bed frame was not cut to proper size and caused many issues getting get the bed frame assembled. I wish I would have took pictures during the build to show you exactly how difficult it was. Do not buy this product!! If so then have a hammer and a grinder to also assemble the bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Good frame, very bad instructions. It's only 12" high, and that makes for a low bed without a box spring, but doable. It's solid and I know I'll never have any trouble with it now that it's put together.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Bar spacing is a little off
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to put together. Truly doesn't squeek. Only thing is the spaces between the bars on the bottom could be closer and if you have a mattress that is too thin you will feel them. Also the bars don't go all the way to the headboard and footboard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy this again or recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Screws washers bolts were rusted.. I hope the rust doesn’t eat up whole things. I removed rust and used it. Assembly took abt 2hours for 1person. Naming on pipes were missing. Instructions suddenly stop at middle of assembly you have to figure out yourself how to get it done.
customer_reviews.author: Prathap Shetty

customer_reviews.title: Bad instructions, but bed is good if you ever manage to put it together.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are written in Engrish so good luck! It only took me 4 hours to put the bed together.
customer_reviews.author: Avvy

customer_reviews.title: Pieces came broken, instructions were horrible
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for this bed are absolutely absurd. There are no words to describe what you have to do and each step includes about 10 steps in it without telling you the order to do things. I had to backtrack multiple times after realizing that I needed to put in another piece before screwing in a different one. This took almost three hours which is crazy. Also half of the plastic pieces were crushed and broken and wouldn’t fit on the right rods. We had to break pieces to have them fit and then stuff the surrounding area so things wouldn’t move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good for college easy to move a little heavy and creaks a lot but still good
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE BED FRAME, BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is horrible. Not only was it extremely difficult to put together....(there were NO instructions) but it is not sturdy, it is not quiet, and it needs to have some type of board over the bars or you can feel them through the mattress!!! I have a 12 inch memory foam and you could still feel it! Do not waste your money!!! I would give it no stars all the way around, but it's not an option!
customer_reviews.author: Raini Lyons

customer_reviews.title: WAIST OF MONEY, NO STURDINESS, AND A PAIN TO PUT TOGETHER :(
customer_reviews.text: got this for our daughters queen mattress and it was a pain to put together and started falling apart with in months. DONT BUY THIS :(
customer_reviews.author: D.C. Ledford

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of SH**!! Waste of money!! The box arrived broken and the hardware was everywhere. It was a giant pain to put together. We’ve had it for less than 3 months and have had to drill holes and add brackets because the legs kept coming loose or bending. It is very cheaply made and noisy! It also stained the bottom of our mattress black. Today one of the side bars snapped. We’re taking it apart and trashing it!! Don’t buy this piece of crap!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Collins

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value. Assembly was a little tricky in spots but definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: rie

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The frame parts are all there but it didn't have the seventh bag of screws and pieces that are needed to put the bed together.. So I basically bought this for nothing since I can't even finish putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Check to see if the component holes align properly
customer_reviews.text: Honestly my one and only issue with the bed frame was that it would not assemble properly. Various parts interlock to make a very solid/sturdy foundation. However, the holes on the set that I had received were not properly aligned. This had in turn made the whole frame useless which was very disappointing. Also a word of caution, if you live in a building with multiple sets of stairs be prepared because it is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Will. You.

customer_reviews.title: Almost returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible small barely readable instructions. Hope you have a magnifying glass. Not very well written either, not good directions at all
customer_reviews.author: John E. Neillie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Giant waste of time. The bed looked nice online which is why I purchased it however, I had 2 major issues with this. 1. UPS lost the package and when it finally did show up, the box was beat to hell and back. Although it was beat to hell and back the box was still in opened. 2. I was missing all of the hardware, 4 pieces of the bed, and there were no instructions that came with it. I am fully disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: I would rate it 0 stars if I could. The holes do not align on the middle supports, the most important part of the bed. Also, one of my supports came to me BENT. Absolutely HORRIBLE video on how to put it together, and spent about 30 minutes before I was finally able to even get to the middle supports. Absolute crap company and crap product.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth G.

customer_reviews.title: Better design elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Poor installation instructions. Missing parts. Questionable engineering design. Competitors offer welded crossmembers rather than dropin. Better products elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Be gentle, this frame is delicate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build frame, looks good, light weight. But as soon as I “broke it in” it broke in 3 places and started squeaking. I have fixed it multiple times until the metal slays gave out. I tried my best to get it back in working condition but it looks like im buying a new frame a few months after buying this one.pardon the mess in the pic
customer_reviews.author: Steve Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Watch assembly video first
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good frame, I wish I had watches the assembly video first. It would have saved me time and frustration. The written directions are worthless. Other than that, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jmart

customer_reviews.title: I didnt recieve all of my parts
customer_reviews.text: It was really fast and I really love my product but I just want the piece that I need to fix my bed because without it the piece is useless without it. I don't want a refund on it but on the site, it won't let me change it to replace it the only thing it wants to do is to just get the piece that I need and they are not an option for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amiee gibson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I had this for less than a month before it started falling apart. The pieces are cheaply made. The seams began to bust and the plastic pieces broke. Me and my partner are both under the weight limit and the legs become lose and bowed. This has been an extreme waste of money. Do not recommend. You can't even roll over without it squeaking. False advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: John Adam Patrick

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This bed was a major pain in the butt to get assembled. Also, it lasted about a month after being set up. The small supporting legs bent pretty fast. They then scratched and gouged my hardwood floors. DO NOT BUY THIS FRAME!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Holmquist

customer_reviews.title: No screws or directions.
customer_reviews.text: Package came on time with no directions, no tools and no screws. Totally unhappy. Hope the replacement frame comes complete.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent online shopper

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set up for less than 4 months, bought it early for a new apartment. NOT only were the directions Horrible, putting it together was a hassle. It does require at least 2 people! It's also not sturdy, it makes a loud squeak with the simplest movement. I would not recommend this especially if you have a kid. I feel at any given moment my daughter and I will be on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lakenya richard

customer_reviews.title: less then 6 months and now the bed is super noisy
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of having this bed frame it started to make noise any time I got in it or moved in the bed at all. The bolts kept getting loose and I started to have to once a week tighten them. The metal itself is super is to get bent. I would not suggest this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Chance

customer_reviews.title: Might need 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Not too terribly easy to put together by yourself, few scratches on finish that were not my doing, but overall a decent frame.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Works but moves around
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t squeak but it moves around a lot and feels like it’s going to fall apart. It doesn’t tho so that’s why the three stars. As long as I’m not moving around a lot it works just fine. Took me hours to set up with a friend though..
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky and Wobbly, not worth money!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions exactly, and this bed is still very wobbly. I have to tighten it at the head and foot way too often. It’s definitely not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Makayela

customer_reviews.title: No. Nope.
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this, you're going to need a box spring. If you're thinking to yourself "but doesn't the description say that you don't need a box spring?" and the answer is yes, the description does say that. However you'll find that when you put your mattress on this frame, the springs make a horrible grinding noise against the metal, so you'll have to get a box spring anyway, which will effectually nullify buying the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wylie

customer_reviews.title: fragile
customer_reviews.text: We had this for few months and already it's falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: A LOT of work!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize QUITE how much work putting the bed together would require before I ordered it but with help, I got it together. There are millions of parts and even more screws and bolts. All in all, I DID get what I paid for and it's pretty sturdy, not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Supprised it was pretty good quity for the price of bed. We set up the bed in the guest room. Do suggest to purchase one for guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit a queen size mattress!
customer_reviews.text: This bed does not fit a queen size bed, there is an entire 10 inches between the end of the mattress and and of the bed. Also it is it sturdy at all
customer_reviews.author: Angela willey

customer_reviews.title: Good product, tough assembly
customer_reviews.text: As advertised but assembly is awful. Instructions were written by a child and shrunk to mini font. But once I finally got it together, I’m happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Donaho

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend, terrible bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Bad bed frame it broke it slats a couple of weeks ago
customer_reviews.author: Florence M

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The frame does not last long. The legs are bending and breaking.
customer_reviews.author: rooney0432

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed frame in March and tonight while trying to go to bed the frame started to collapse. So had to take it apart and now just sleeping on a matress tonight and until I can get a new frame. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this bed after reading the reviews. The description claims to have a "no squeak" frame. We had to try it out doing some adult activities. The bed is well made and it goes well with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bedframe
customer_reviews.text: Love the clean lines. Very sturdy construction. Heavy and makes no noise.
customer_reviews.author: Oogie 18

customer_reviews.title: Geeeesh !!!!!!!?
customer_reviews.text: This bed was a nightmare sorry I ever purchased it. I simply did not have the time or the patience to deal with this. What should at best been five pieces was a million. Whoever designed this bed was an idiot !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL LEGGETT-JONES

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were so small I could barley read them(also is wasn’t step by step, you were doing multiple things at once), then pieces came broke, and the package looked like it was thrown off the truck and ran over, wasn’t impressed, then the slates don’t fit and they fall out. I had to tape it.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not very high quality IMO
customer_reviews.text: The bars stayed ok for a while, but get lose, and bend if you screw things in very tight. Hard to get perfectly right.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Rose

customer_reviews.title: most complicated resolution on the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: There are 100 nuts and screws for this bed. No explanation of how to put bed frame together. Bars would not fit together. Very stressful to put to gether. Instructions are terrible.. Takes 2 to 3 people to put together. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible bed. Doesn't hold up longer than 2 months starts to unscrew itself and become very weak and squeaky. Assembly took forever because it came in a million pieces. Doesn't matter how many times I tighten it, it just becomes loose everywhere again.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Cruz

customer_reviews.title: sturdy bed frame
customer_reviews.text: enough sturdy, exceeded expectations. i like it so much. will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Xu mei lin

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE DOESN'T LAST
customer_reviews.text: Only had this bed for 3 month and it broke today.
customer_reviews.author: CyCy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, trash. 4 months and the bed broke. 2 legs completely bent. The bed is not sturdy. Because the legs are not attached to the metal bars, just screwed in they eventually give out. You can do better with a frame from Walmart for less than 40 and the legs are attached.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Tresa

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're a solo sleeper avoid like the plague. My wife and I are on the heavier side but definitely fit within the weight restriction. It was also extremely difficult to assemble. The steel is incredibly flimsy and it isn't a matter of how this frame will break, but WHEN. We only had this frame for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: So look Disappointed, never buying again.
customer_reviews.text: I brought a queen size bed frame 3 days ago and got a king size bed frame. So very disappointed, and the box said that it was open. I'm missing too bars that go in the middle to hold the mattress and some tools to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: AmberAmaro2

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This seems really sturdy once you get it together. The instructions absolutely suck but anyone with a little basic knowledge can manage it. It is pretty quiet when moving around on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble to be honest took so long.. I finally got it and didn't even sleep in until the next night 😴 I was so exhausted.
customer_reviews.author: antonice

customer_reviews.title: Broke at first use
customer_reviews.text: The frame broke and the assembling of the frame itself was hell. The parts were rusty. And some parts were either missing or extra making it more confusing if you’re building the frame correctly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The main support bars started bending and peeling apart in less than 3 months time. I weigh under 110 lbs and am the only one who slept on it. The worst item I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: All the pieces were there but when put together it's not sturdy and the bars pop out of the holes when there's any movement! I'd send it back but that's a hard item to send back especially when I destroyed the box trying to get it open. Urgent kind of disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany.

customer_reviews.title: Bad investment
customer_reviews.text: At first it was a good bed frame but after a week all the screws went loose and I had to re tighten all of them. Eventually the screw threads stripped and the aluminum bars bent and broke. I do not recommend this bed frame not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges are dangerous
customer_reviews.text: After two months of use the legs are falling apart and the sharp edges on the side resulted in a 4'' laceration on the back of my calf.
customer_reviews.author: erica joy csabon

customer_reviews.title: Easier frames to assemble for the same price
customer_reviews.text: Such a pain to put together, but works well when you finally have it built.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Pugh

product_meta.title: GreenForest Metal Bed Frame Queen Size with Headboard Steel Platform Bed with Updated Square Tubes Sturdy Mattress Foundation Studio Bed No Box Spring Needed, Black
feature_bullets: Metal queen bed frame with updated square tubes, compared with general circular tube bed frame, this bed is more sturdy and noiseless, give you a whole night quiet and cozy sleep. The weight capacity can be 660 lbs.

Metal queen size bed frame with 12 inch underneath space, which provide enough space to collect and store your suitcase, quilts, books and so on, which make your bedroom or guest room more tidy and neat.

Bed frame metal queen size do not need box spring, the steel slats is a strong mattress foundation, you can put your mattress on it directly, do not need to buy a box spring, which is more cost-effective. Also a great choice in dorm or hotel.
Studio bed frame is designed with modern headboard and footboard, combine for stylish mattress support. And after assembling it well, just need to put a mattress you can use it, how convenient it is!

Queen bed frame with all parts included, clear instruction and assembly video, you can install it step by step, any question please do not hesitate to contact us, we are here to help you in 7x24 hours.
